xt:extension.xt:author: Wendell Piez
xt:extension.xt:name: JATSKit (v1.1.0)

xt:description.h2: oXygen XML Editor framework for NISO JATS 1.1 / NLM BITS 2.0
xt:description.p: NISO JATS Z39.96-2012 defines an XML-based format for the authoring, publication and archiving of journal articles and related information. Its design is based on the NLM Journal Archiving and Publishing DTDs through version 3.0. This framework supports JATS 1.1 and BITS 2.0, and is extensible to cover earlier and variant forms of JATS and NLM journal publishing.

ol.li: Updated extensibility architecture for variant document types and local profiles
Updated and improved "Authoring Mode" display stylesheets
Updated and improved inline documentation of elements and attributes
EPUB3 and "mock ebook" (web site) production for BITS
